MRP.JO.summary: Mr Price Group Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a fashion value retailer serving women, men, and children in South Africa and internationally. The company operates through three segments: Apparel, Home, and Financial Services and Cellular. It offers clothing, underwear, footwear, cosmetics, and accessories; furniture and kids merchandise; sporting, outdoor, and fitness products comprising footwear, apparel, equipment, and accessories; women's smart and casual fashion and intimate wear; and home textile and dÃ©cor products for bedroom, living-room, bathroom, kitchen, and dining-room. The company also provides credit; manages and collects debtor's books; and markets financial services, cellular products, and value-added services, as well as offers store cards, airtime, and insurance products. It serves its customers through an omni-channel retail distribution of 1,378 corporate-owned stores and 9 franchised stores in Africa, as well as through its online channels. Mr Price Group Limited was founded in 1885 and is headquartered in Durban, South Africa.

RTO.JO.summary: Rex Trueform Group Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the retail of clothing and accessories in South Africa. It operates through Retail, Property, and Water Infrastructure segments. The company offers ladies' and men's clothing, shoes, costume jewelry, related fashion accessories, and cosmetics through branded Queenspark outlets located in South Africa and Namibia, as well as through a Queenspark branded franchised outlet in Kenya. It also invests in properties; and has investments in a private water and wastewater utility group that operates in South Africa. The company was formerly known as Rex Trueform Clothing Company Limited and changed its name to Rex Trueform Group Limited in January 2018. The company was founded in 1937 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa. Rex Trueform Group Limited is a subsidiary of African and Overseas Enterprises Limited.

TRU.JO.summary: Truworths International Limited, an investment holding and management company, engages in the retail of fashion apparel, footwear, and related merchandise and homeware. It operates through Truworths and Office segments. The company operates approximately 728 stores in South Africa; and 49 stores in the rest of Africa. It serves in South Africa, the United Kingdom, Germany, the Republic of Ireland, and other sub-Saharan African countries. Truworths International Limited was founded in 1917 and is based in Cape Town, South Africa.
